Docs.typeparam: The type of elements in the array.
Docs.summary: Represents an element in a multidimensional array that can be used as an l-value in an expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.MultidimensionalArrayItemReference%601.Indices%2A> property is read-only, but the items in the collection can be modified and the indices can be changed.
